summary:
Saskia Troy is a British-Dutch global business and stakeholder manager that works at the interface of business, sustainability and peace building.She has been working and doing internships for amongst others Shell, KPN, ABN Amro, the Erasmus University of Rotterdam, the University of Amsterdam, Ministry of Finance (Supreme Auditing Court), Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the United Nations.

During her life she had a period of five years of intensive revalidation due to an accident with horse-riding which has strengthened her philosophy as an advocate for human rights, sustainability and youth leadership. Saskia has been a member of the marketing delegation of the Dutch Nuon Solar Team that became world champion while participating within the World Solar Challenge.

She loves sports and competition she has been debating and adjudicating within national and international championships. She has been a member of the core adjudication team of the BBC Public Speaking and Writing Awards and the NS Publieksprijs for Book of the Year awarding international literairy bestsellers. She has won prices within the UNESCO Human Rights Day Photo Contest in Costa Rica and International Youth Day Arts Competition in Dubai.

Next to that she has been awarded for the best contribution to the political debate within the Young Liberal Democrats with the project of Market, Morality and the Environment in the Netherlands (Hans Wiegel Grand Prix). Currently she is in the board of the theme group Defense and International Security and chairing the Committee of Europe and Russia for the Liberal Democrats.

She has been publishing books and articles on sustainable leadership for Global Education Magazine of UNESCO and the UNHR, UN's Children of the Earth and the Dutch newspaper NRC.



You can read more about Saskia at http://saskiatroy.wordpress.com/. Please sent an e-mail to saskia.troy@gmail.com to receive her full CV!

profile_positions.description: She is a member of the UNEP Technical Working Group that develops worldwide environmental standards for banking and accountance (together with the World Resources Institute and Greenhouse Gas Protocol). Others that are participating within the process are amongst other Barclay, Credit Suisse and Bank of America.
profile_positions.title: UNEP Sustainable Finance Initiative Technical Working Group

profile_positions.description: The theme group advises Dutch and European Parliament on issues such as the mission in Afghanistan, the conflict in Israel/Palestine, Europe and Russia, the Arabic Revolution in the Middle-East, the National and European Defense Strategy and the Joint Strike Fighter (JSF).
profile_positions.title: Board Member Theme Group Defense and International Security Liberal Democrats (D66)

profile_positions.description: The committee is part of the theme group Defense and International Security and advises Dutch and European Parliament on Europe, Russia and the crisis in Ukraine
profile_positions.title: President Committee Europe and Russia Liberal Democrats (D66)

profile_positions.description: The Chapter Coordinator of Children of the Earth oversees the Chapters around the world and takes responsibility for the day-to-day operation and management of established Chapters. In doing so Saskia works together in a shared job with Princess Ogechi Ukaga. They work on the the local Hub and Chapter Management of Europe, Africa, North and Central America, Middle-East, Asia, Latin America and the Caribbean. Next to that they work on the global strategy, marketing and sales, business development and the development of training programs for youth, NGO's, government, education, multinationals and business enterprises.
profile_positions.title: Global Chapter Coordinator Children of the Earth (NGO of UN)

profile_positions.location: Eastern Heartland (formerly land of Hope) Nigeria (Niger Delta)
profile_positions.description: She is connected as a research partner to the centre of Princess Ogechi Ukaga while investigating the role of sustainable leadership within multinational business. Furthermore she works as a business consultant  within her role as a global chapter manager for Children of the Earth for Princess Ukaga for the One Peaceful Africa project which is organizing peace building activities in several African countries.
profile_positions.title: Research Partner Peace Centre Children of the Earth  Nigeria (NGO of United Nations)

profile_positions.description: The UNDP's task forces African and Europe develop a collective vision that will be used directly by the United Nations High Level Committee chaired by world leaders. She is a member of the Theme Group Health Care inclusive Sexual and Reproductive Rights and participated amongst others within  a consultation on the Sustainable Development Goals, Health Care and Sexual Rights and Child Poverty.
profile_positions.title: Member Working Group United Nations Development Programme Post-2015 Agenda

profile_positions.description: The Regional Coordinator Europe oversees the European Chapters and takes responsibility for the day-to-day operation and management. The Chapter Leader Netherlands is responsible for the management of the activities for children and youth for the local chapter in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Regional Coordinator Europe and Chapter Leader Netherlands Children of the Earth (NGO of UN)

profile_positions.description: She has been adjudicating at the BBC and ESU Public Speaking, Young Writers and Digital Voice Awards are organised by the BBC in partnership with the English-Speaking Union (ESU) and the Netherlands-England Society (GNE) for several years
profile_positions.title: Adjudication BBC/Netherlands-England Society Public Speaking and Writing Awards

company.name: NS Publieksprijs Book of the Year Award Netherlands

profile_positions.company: NS Publieksprijs Book of the Year Award Netherlands
profile_positions.description: The NS Publieksprijs is a literary award for the Book of the Year within the Netherlands (which can also be translated work). Previous winners are amongst others the bestselling novels  Tonio (A.F.Th. van der Heijden), Komt een Vrouw bij de Dokter (Kluun), Heren van de Thee (H.S. Haasse), Het zijn net Mensen (Beelden uit het Midden-Oosten) (J. Luyendijk), De Overgave (Arthur Japin), In Europa (G.Mak) and Harry Potter en de Vuursteen (J.K.Rowling).
profile_positions.title: Member of the Core Adjudicating Team NS Publieksprijs Book of the Year Award

profile_positions.description: The development of an international marketing strategy for Shell Chemicals Hydrocarbon Solvents for Europe, Turkey and Russia. For this she has been working closely together with Shell Projects & Technology in Amsterdam. Next to that she has made use of her experiences in developing a case-study of Shell, sustainability and collaborative enterprises within a global business and stakeholder management environment
profile_positions.title: PhD-Internship Sustainable Leadership Shell Chemicals Marketing Europe, Africa and Middle-East

profile_positions.description: PhD-internship for the department of Shell Retail Benelux and France. She has been developing a case about sustainability, the collaborative model and innovation which is related to sustainable electric mobility within the Netherlands. Next to that she has been exploring the initiatives for building the infrastructure for electric mobility within the Netherlands for the Energy Transition department within The Hague (for Dick Benschop, CEO of Shell Netherlands and his Dutch energy transition management team).
profile_positions.title: PhD-internship Sustainable Leadership Shell Retail Benelux and France

profile_positions.description: From within her function as a board member of UNICEF Rotterdam she aimed to support girls education within Africa and the rest of the world. For example, she has been participating within UNICEF Empowering Women of the Rotterdam  School of Management (RSM) Charity Club.
profile_positions.title: Member Regional Action Committee UNICEF Rotterdam

profile_positions.description: For several years she has been a member of the jury of the Business Game for the course of Strategic Business Planning.
profile_positions.title: Guest lecturer, Strategic Marketing, International Business Administration, RSM, Erasmus University

company.name: University of Amsterdam/Erasmus University of Rotterdam

profile_positions.company: University of Amsterdam/Erasmus University of Rotterdam
profile_positions.description: She has been participating in a European research project on migration and integration for the Institute of Migration Studies in Amsterdam, which has been subsidized by the European Commission. The project has been executed within different countries of the European Union which are amongst others Poland, Hungary, Greece, Portugal, Austria and the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Associate European Research Project Migration and Integration UvA/EUR

volunteer_experiences.role: VN Ambassadeur voor het Verdrag voor de Rechten van Mensen met een Beperking
volunteer_experiences.description: VN ambassadeurs nemen zelf initiatieven als het gaat om het waarmaken van het Verdrag voor de Rechten van Mensen met een Beperking maar ze kunnen ook op verzoek van derden hun bijdrage leveren
